commit.message:
UTF_8.java (decodeLoop): Set inPos to in.position().

2005-02-16  Julian Scheid  <julian@sektor37.de>

       * gnu/java/nio/charset/UTF_8.java (decodeLoop): Set inPos to
       in.position().
       (encodeLoop): Likewise.

From-SVN: r95125
